subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Second-half goals from Toni Kroos and Thomas Müller gave Bayern Munich a 2-0 victory at Arsenal and firm command of their Round of 16 Champions League series.
snippet: Second-half goals from Toni Kroos and Thomas Müller gave Bayern Munich a 2-0 victory at Arsenal and firm command of their Round of 16 Champions League series.
